metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9232 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In libvpx, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID: A-122675483

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvpx3 - 1.5.0-2ubuntu1.1
vpx-tools - 1.5.0-2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvpx package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.0-2ubuntu1.1').
